proposal: Diving into the world of AI creativity with StellaryAI, I see you're the go-to for creators looking to blend images, videos, voiceovers, and music with the power of web3. Congrats on gathering 174 visionaries in the ETH network! Imagine integrating a DEX or a Lottery where your community doesn't just create, but also shares in the revenue. Let's make web3 creativity not just collaborative, but also rewarding.
